entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Estevan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Airport 06:46 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -15.0°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -17.3°C
Wind: SE 26 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 11 with temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow early this morning and this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 11 with temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
